Reviews.Title: its the best
Reviews.Author: cherryzoom
Reviews.Content: it is the best phone that i have ever seen.it's faster than an iphone.it has the best body quality.it is small.i love it  recommended by everyone

Reviews.Title: It s great to its price
Reviews.Author: Muharrem Yasar
Reviews.Content: first it is not an iphone 4s, and samsung s2,but it has really cool design, and great features according to its price.i do not need iphone if i pay half .You should try, definitely recommended

Reviews.Title: I phone eater.
Reviews.Author: Kazeemoto
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best phone I have ever had. Bought my wife an iPhone 4 and this phone makes it look like a paper weight.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Mr. Adam Banahan "Adman"
Reviews.Content: Nice design and has cool features including hd/3d technology when using a hdmi cable. Hopefully battery life is as good as the other features...!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Gzuz Garcia
Reviews.Content: If you don't know if you want to buy a tablet or a phone this is your choise.Very fast, thin and good looking.The only thing is it doesn't have front camera.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: love this phone, got it for xmas everything works well great screen, touch, camera, my only complaint is that it is a bit  large so can be hard to text with one hand or when lying down.

Reviews.Title: This is not International 3G phone ( Is Edge 2G with AT&T;/T-Mobile)
Reviews.Author: Chuck Yuen
Reviews.Content: All the Arc & Arc-S  is Cheaply make  you will have  hairline cracking and the Silver Pain-Work  just peel off within a few months theat is the major issues ... This phones is Useless is not the International Xperia Version that we all known about...like the Xperia X10i International Version back in late 2010 which support 3G-"H "in the USA and in Europe-Asia with 900/1700/2100 from "T-mobile USA" ..... In the States You will only get 2g with AT&T; and T-Mobile ...That is just a very basic over-priced ancient 2G phone with great camera in the USA but will work great in Asia/Europe.
